attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: leave our cider alone its our heritage.whats wrong with enjoying our local drink? are you gonna put up the price of pasties in cornwall? pies in milton mowbray? i can understand white cider as noone drinks it! but what about thatchers,sheppys,gaymers etc... i am a responsible adult like the majority of the west country.i am disgusted,i see so many local pubs closing you are destroying our town and village pubs

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
